creator: apache-bugzilla@distributopia.com
text:
PrintWriter.println() is evil because it uses the line.separator
system property for EOL, instead of always using CRLF as per the
HTTP spec. I've posted a fix to the watchdog-dev list.

I've modified GTest so that it doesn't use PrintWriter to write the request to
the server.  

Please see the commit for changes.
creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
